turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Peet's

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Which Peet's would you like to order from? (You can specify a street address, city or zipcode)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 817 Elm St in Winnetka Illinois

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I have Peet's Coffee at 817 Elm St, Winnetka, IL 60093. Is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have a milk preference?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. I have a Medium Caramel Macchiato with 2% milk. Is that your complete order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to pick this up now or in the future?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Now

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. I have placed your order. It will be ready when you arrive.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt and order confirmation will arrive shortly via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok
